artist: Artist: Linda Schwarz; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
description: two mirror images of hands in blessing gesture (two fingers raised) with drapery in background; sheet treated to show premature yellowing and foxing
medium: Photolithograph with hand-painted ink and varnish on paper
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2003.
signed: verso, in pencil: 6/11 e.v./ \'Gesture XVIII\'/ 39/2002 / L. Schwarz
title: Gesture XVII
